TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ControlExtensions extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供扩展方法，它可用于向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具自定义的 Word 文档添加 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Provides extension methods you can use to add Windows Forms controls to a Word document that has been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在运行时由属性 (在应用程序级项目中) 或属性 (在文档级项目中) 返回的对象上可用的扩展方法。 The methods are extension methods that are available on the object returned by the property (in an application-level project) or the property (in a document-level project) at run time. 若要将特定控件添加到文档中, 请使用方法, 该方法在方法名称中包含控件的名称。To add a specific control to a document, use the method that includes the name of the control in the method name. 例如, 若要添加, 请使用方法。For example, to add a , use the method. 有关将控件添加到文档的详细信息, 请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information about adding controls to a document, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). 有关扩展方法的详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51)和[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6)。For more information about extension methods, see [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51) and [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6). > [!NOTE] > 在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Word 外接程序项目中, 你必须先添加对 "" 的引用, 然后才能访问方法, 然后才能访问。In Word add-in projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you must add a reference to the Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.v4.0.Utilities.dll assembly before you can access the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将控件添加到文档中的第一个段落, 然后向该按钮添加文本。The following code example uses the method to add a control to the first paragraph in the document, and then adds text to the button. 若要使用此示例, 请在文档`ThisDocument`级项目的类中运行它。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使你能够将对象添加到的末尾。 This method enables you to add objects to the end of the . 若要移除以编程方式添加的, 请使用方法。To remove a that was added programmatically, use the method. 当您将多个单选按钮直接添加到文档时, 单选按钮并不是互相排斥的。When you add multiple radio buttons directly to the document, the radio buttons are not mutually exclusive. 你可以编写代码以使单选按钮互斥;但是, 首选方法是将单选按钮添加到用户控件, 然后将该用户控件添加到文档中。You can write code to make the radio buttons mutually exclusive; however, the preferred approach is to add the radio buttons to a user control and then add the user control to the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个控件添加到文档中的第一个和第二个段落, 然后将文本分配给每个控件。The following code example adds two controls to the document in the first and second paragraphs, and then assigns text to each control. 若要使用此示例, 请在文档`ThisDocument`级项目的类中运行它。To use this example, run it from the `ThisDocument` class in a document-level project.
